name: Pulsar
description: Pulsar Game offers a blockchain-powered gaming ecosystem where players can enjoy play-to-earn experiences. It integrates unique features for in-game assets, rewarding users for their participation. The platform uses NFTs and other blockchain technologies to enhance gaming and enable true ownership of in-game items.

chains.name: Pulsar
chains.description: Pulsar combines game elements of the Real Time Strategy (RTS) genre with a persistent, massively multiplayer online (MMO) world. From the former Tech Director of the whole technology and the New IPs Director of King (Candy Crush Franchise) arrives Pulsar.
